showcase.title: {{topic}} Resources in the NIAID Data Ecosystem
showcase.description: This section provides a visual summary of the resources available within the NIAID Discovery Portal for {{topic}} research. [View all search results related to {{topic}}]({{query}}).

treemaplist.title: Resources mentioning {{topic}} also mentioned the following:
treemaplist.description: {{topic}} datasets, computational tools, and resource catalogs also encompass different Health Conditions, Pathogens, and Measurement Techniques. Use the interactive figures below to help identify resources that advance your research needs.

types.title: Data Types
types.description: The NIAID Data Ecosystem currently ingests metadata for Datasets, Computational Tools and Resource Catalogs. Click on a type of resource to conduct a type-specific search for {{topic}} resources.

sources.title: Data Sources
sources.description: {{topic}} researchers share their datasets, computational tools and other resources by depositing them in a variety of different repositories.  Use the visualization to explore the resources in the NIAID Data Ecosystem by source.

conditions-of-access.title: Conditions Of Access
conditions-of-access.description: Access requirements, like whether registration or a data use agreement (DUA) is needed to access a resource, arenâ€™t always clear. Use the visualization to see how access conditions are distributed and click any category to filter {{topic}} resources by that access type.
